examples: When will the crisis come to a head?
The crisis flattened the market.
She's a woman who can think fast in a crisis.
last year's state budget crisis
An economic crisis is looming on the horizon.
The crisis had eventuated favourably.
The country now faces an economic crisis.
We must act soon to end this crisis.
His children failed him in the crisis.
Her death precipitated a family crisis.
Maserati staggered from crisis to crisis.
A year ago, both companies were in crisis.
The crisis has caused oil prices to skyrocket.
He acted sensibly in the crisis.
He was her rock during the crisis.
The car industry is now in crisis.
She handled the crisis with facility.
This crisis calls for immediate action.
This crisis requires a measured response.
She has reached a crisis point in her career.
There is a crisis of identity in adolescence.
The crisis prompted a rising tide of protest.
The death of Edward III determined the crisis.
the crisis precipitated by Russia's revolution
The war has aggravated an acute economic crisis.
We were not prepared to face this type of crisis.
a coolheaded response to the crisis
He seems to be going through a crisis.
He dealt inefficiently with the crisis.
The crisis was resolved by negotiations.
example_translate: Когда кризис достигнет своего апогея?

Мы должны действовать быстро, чтобы положить конец этому кризису.
Дети подвели его в критический момент.
Её смерть усугубила семейный кризис.

Год назад обе компании переживали кризис.
Кризис вызвал резкий скачок цен на нефть.

хладнокровная реакция на кризис
